snippet.title: LEGO Batman 2 - All DLC Characters (Hero & Villain Character Packs)
snippet.description:
All downloadable characters in LEGO Batman 2 DC Super Heroes for the Xbox 360. #Batman #LEGOBatman2 #LEGOBatman This video shows the 5 Heros and 5 Villain characters from the two downloadable character packs.  I didn't previously show them in my LEGO Batman 2 100% walkthrough.  The time when each character shows up in the video is listed below.

This channel features instructional & highly edited video game guides, walkthroughs, speedruns and other uniquely transformative videos.  My own personal gameplay, extensive editing & creative input are clearly added into each video, ensuring that all videos adhere to YouTube's partner program guidelines.  My walkthoughs take tremendous amounts of work & editing so that all videos are straight to the point & can be used as professional video game guides.  All gameplay is my own & is recorded and edited solely by me.  Permission to upload each game was provided by the game publisher.

LEGO Batman 2 DC Super Heroes Walkthrough and 100% Guide Playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYpDU5ElRBfk7bmmVmgg4ECXeQf9iJyfq

00:06 - Robin (Damian Wayne)
01:18 - Nightwing
02:10 - Shazam
03:53 - Katana
04:32 - Zatanna
05:40 - Bizarro
07:34 - Black Adam
08:33 - Captain Cold
09:24 - Gorilla Grodd
10:20 - Black Manta
